Reviews.Title: “Fabulous resort - highly recommend - friendly, quiet and gorgeous”
Reviews.Author: Dollybird55
Reviews.Content: This resort is a cut above, it is one to visit if you go to Kissimmee. Safe - guard gated and very helpful and friendly. They drive round the resort too making sure all is ok. Lots to do - nature trails, pools, spa, games, the lake - amazing views and very relaxing local to shops and restaurants very clean area relatively new homes - although they are 'condos' they are more like houses as they are not piled up and there is no one above or below you Great place - would say again!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful resort, great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: melblake4
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this resort, peaceful with magnificent views of Lake Marion. Accomodation is clean, spacious and perfect for a vacation getaway.

Reviews.Title: “accomodations great but staff was short handed. NOT BOATER FRIENDLY”
Reviews.Author: jrt1_10
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful 3/2 villa and were very pleased with it.however there was no staff or office that we ever saw,only security and for the most part they were nice except Jim an ex cop with an I'm big and bad complex and a very smart mouth after waiting for the better part of 1/2 hour for someone to let us in after going out to dinner he showed up and was almost beligerant.hopefully he will be replaced.If you have a boat you have to park it in the woods in a locked lot and you cant get to it unless you go get a guard and ask them to go and let you in to get what is your property.and to play billiards you will have to give up your I D to get the equip to play.The list goes on and on..... and dont even think of swimming any time near dusk muchless dark as the pool closes about an hour before dark and oh yeah lake marion has almost no fish in it .GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!

Reviews.Title: “ENJOYED EVERY MINUTE !! DID'NT WANT TO COME HOME”
Reviews.Author: ALIBirmingham
Reviews.Content: Stayed in lovely 3 bedroomed villa , just proves there is more to Florida than theme parks , residents and staff very friendly ,beautiful location , I wish I could afford to buy a house there , themes were about 35mins but we stayed local and enjoyed the amenities on site , and the local area.Wil definateley go again one day !!

Reviews.Title: “Really good fortnight.. Totally Worth it”
Reviews.Author: Hannah768990
Reviews.Content: Lake marion is in a scenic location, the villa my family stayed in was very clean, everything was working properly, and we were only a short walk from the lake, the tennis courts, the 2 swimming pools, and the clubhouse. I couldn't fault it. The staff were friendly and very helpful. There is a supermarket, (walmart) and some restaurants (BK, panda chinese,....) 10 minutes down the road, and it is a great location for the disney parks, without being in or overly near to international drive, so you get a taste of real florida, not created for tourists. 5 stars and highly reccommended to anybody. (note they don't provide cots/cribs for babies, only moses baskets, so come prepared if you have young children!)

Reviews.Title: “Really enjoyed the stay”
Reviews.Author: restful56
Reviews.Content: I visited the Lake Marion in July. I really enjoyed the stay. The villa was very clean. I was weary about staying there after reading the reviews, but took the chance and I was not disappointed. I would definitely stay there again, but I will bring more cookware.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: SPO14
Reviews.Content: My family and I were in Florida for a family reunion in July 2008. I contacted a friend that does a lot of traveling and he informed me that Lake Marion was a great place to stay. We had never stayed in a condo before, always hotels. I noticed on the internet that some of the reviews were not good about the Resort. I called the facility and the Property Manager assured me that everything was going to be fine. I called 5 times and she was never rude and she always answered my questions. We were still a little hesitant about staying there. On the way to the Resort, we got lost and the Property Manager guided us right to the Resort over the phone. She was very polite and even though it was about 4:50pm she took her time and read through all the material with me. She also had given me her cell phone number if anything was not right. The stay was perfect and we are going back for Thanksgiving. The Resort is a little far out, but the stay is well worth it. We felt as if we were still at home. The apartment was huge and clean. I would recommend this Resort to all of my friends and family. Just a little FYI, do investigations on the reviews before you believe them.

Reviews.Title: “You Won't Find a "RESORT" here!!!!”
Reviews.Author: mommy2cat
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for Fathers Day weekend. It is nothing like any of us were expecting. We stayed in a 3 bedroom 2 bath villa. It was okay. There were a lot of roaches and the place reeked of moth balls. Upon arrival I had to wash all the towels and rags because they smelt like mold. It appeared someone had washed them and didn't let them dry all the way and then put them back under the cabinets. So first night in, I am already doing laundry. Upon check out, There is a notice on the door reading that we must wash and dry all soiled/used bedsheets, towels and wash and clean all dishes. Now the dishes I can understand. However, I did not come on vacation to do all the bedsheets and towels that we used. We are paying a cleaning fee and I would assume that would cover this. Our rental agreement said no such thing, but in big bold letters on a note attached to the door it specifically said this must be done prior to check out. I already had to wash this stuff when I arrived. No way am I doing it when checking out also. And they expect you to wake up on check out date and clean, wash and check out prior to 11am. Are you kidding me? Also upon arrival, It is 82 degrees in the home, the fridge is unplugged and so now I must plug it in and hope that is cools off all the food that was purchased. The hot water heater is not working, Oh that is because that is not plugged in either. There again on that nice bold letter attached to the door it says when you leave to unplug all appliances, turn the air to 82 and unplug the fridge and open the doors of fridge/freezer. Again, Are you kidding me? We did find the lake, It was quite large. But you need to bring your own boat or kayak. No fish were biting, We were told by a local resident you need live bait. We are in the middle of no where, No bait shops, no boat rentals. This is NOT a resort. This is a community of villas and town homes that just has the word "resort" in the name. It was quite a disappointment. The Tiki bar that was mentioned to us upon booking the place-Well it's there but no one works it. There is no liquor or beer or anything served at the pool. In fact, The same local we saw at the lake informed us that the staff hours had been cut and they worked only M-Friday for 3 hours a day. So good luck finding any help. There are tennis courts, volley ball courts, basketball courts, ping pong table, and pool table. However, You must have your own stuff to play. There are no tennis raquets or balls, no balls or sticks for the pool table, and so on. I am quite disappointed in what was supposed to be a nice Fathers Day retreat. Will never book here again!

Reviews.Title: “great resort although a little out the way”
Reviews.Author: fbharry
Reviews.Content: I have read all the reviews about lake marion golf resort and saw that there were mixed reports on the place and the accommodation. We arrived on a wednesday night having flown in from london gatwick, this was not our first holiday in the orlando area we have been frequent visitors since 2003. First up, the guys on security are first class, really helpfull, we had booked our accomadation direct from a villa web site and the owner of the condo, having looked around at prices we were suprised at how cheap (for uk) the condo seemed to be. We paid £500 for 2 weeks and having looked around could not find anything to match the price. I hoped that like all people do the price was not going to mean that the place was a dive and the pictures were from 1977, but no, the condo was spot on. Very clean and plenty of space, nice on suites and everything we needed for the holiday. You will find however that you are out in the wilds. It is a good 40 minute ride in the car to 192, and although the map makes it look like haines city is close, it is not, that's at least 30-40 minutes away as well. Ponciana is the closest town and its not bad, we found the cheapest fuel around at $2.99 a gallon (cheap for us brits) at the local publix, but ponciana is still in the throws of development, it does have a walmart and a publix and a dennys and a few of the other type shops like a pizza shop a chinese a couple of banks, but none of the other regular restuarants yet, and as has been the way in orlando & kissimmee for the past 10 + years there are road works on most of the roads locally. I cant say why some poeple have given this resort a bad review, I can only tell you about my stay, this place is great, nice and clean, yes the linen in our condo was not egyptian cotton, but it was clean and so was the condo. Price wise you cant go wrong here. there are 2 pools and an outdoor jaccuzzi, only one of the pools were heated but that was fine, we swam in both, tempreture was around the high 70,s most of the time, oh and yes there is a lake, its not been really well sign posted and the road from the reort to the lake looks new, but its stunning and well worth the 2-3 min car ride to have a look, there are also nature trails and if we had had more time I would have hired a bike to ride about on. If you have kids and have a budget you cannot go wrong here, it's just the traveling to and from 192, the theme parks and eating out that takes a little longer, as the fuel prices are so cheap in the us it was not a major factor for our family, we tended to go out for the whole day rather that return to the condo mid afternoon. So I can recomend this place highly, the only bad bit that we came across was the people in the resort reception, they were less than helpfull (our experiance) as we didnt book our condo through them it had very little impact on stay.Very happy to speak with anyone regarding this stay.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting!!!”
Reviews.Author: gatorfan1710
Reviews.Content: Check in is at 4 but the office closes by 5:30 so we called to tell them that we would be a late check -in. We arrived before 8 but there were no directions on how to get into the gate. I had read an earlier review and found the keys to our unit. The air was not working and after some time we received a return phone call from one of the three numbers we called to report the problem. After 2 hours a very nice man came and fixed the air. It worked for about 40 minutes. Another phone call to Carmen (the manager) and we were told where to find keys to another unit. Our second unit had a working air conditioner and more updated furniture so we were thrilled...until we found the bathrooms had no towels, no toilet paper and were never cleaned! Our third unit was nice. The units are old and poorly constructed. (shower door wouldn't open, floors creak on 2nd floor). It is a 2-bedroom villa for the price of a hotel room but I would recommend staying elsewhere. No general store, ridiculous continental breakfast (little debbies), no watercraft rental, not friendly, and definitely not 3 stars. If you don't mind old and worn out and aren't looking for amenties it would be ok for a family on a budget. Otherwise you are better off at a hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great Quite Place ”
Reviews.Author: nicsdad69
Reviews.Content: Vey nice quite place. Great pool and playground. 30 min. to Disney. Great pizza 15 min. away. The lake is very nice and a prime place to fish. Visit [-]

Reviews.Title: “Best Scrow you can get ever”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Will never come close to it??. Imagine that we have to wash the sheet to sleep on theme?? imagine the breakfast is frozen and toaster not working (and we have to wait until they come back from shopping)?? Imagine there is no lake(even it's called Lake Marion) Imagine coming back tired from the attraction and you have at least one hour making lefts and rights to get there (in the middle of no where??? and much moooore.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be Back!”
Reviews.Author: drummerhill
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Lake Marion Resort for a week in August. The three bedroom villa was great (clean, nicely furnished and well maintained)! This property you are either going to love or... well not. It is located on the outer edges of Poinciana on Lake Marion, which is about 25 minutes south-west of Kissimmee. Disney is about 45 minutes. The resort is a good value! It's quiet, restful and most pleasant. The clubhouse, pool, and outdoor bar areas were clean and inviting. If you are looking for the excitement and action of the big Disney-style resorts in Kissimmee/Orlando, etc., this is NOT the place for you. A complimentary continental breakfast was served every morning in the clubhouse. The staff was friendly and extremely helpful. We'll be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Home Sweet Home”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Lake Marion Golf Resort for a month and never had such a incredible time, very clean, peaceful, great hospitality with us. The plac is very quiet and beautiful. This is my second time around and it will be my " Home Sweet Home for my family and me. Thank You Lake Marion Golf Resort and their employees Especially Maria.

Reviews.Title: “Still beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: DeliGuy
Reviews.Content: This is our second trip to Lake Marion Resort. It really survived the hurricanes well! We rented this unit directly from the owners at VRBO and they really treated us well. We really liked it that the Tiki bar was up and running at the pool--Joe (the owner) is a hoot. The place we had was spotless and freshly painted. We really got to know our way around the area and used the back roads to the parks. The pool is still the warmest we have been to in the area! We are thinking of retiring there!

Reviews.Title: “Loved the resort”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We had a great time. We golfed at Sun Aire Golf course (5 mins away) They let us play 9 holes with golf cart for $15!! Went to Bok Tower and Cypress Gardens (20 mins) and Disney (35 mins) We brought our boat and kept it the whole 2 weeks at the resort's docks and replenished our fishing gear at the 24 hr Super Walmart (10 mins) The kids made friends and learned to play tennis on the lit courts. What is great about this place is that it is close enough to everything but far enough away from the tourist crowds that you can get a bite to eat at the town center without the crouds. We really recommend the grill at Solvita! This is a hidden gem.

Reviews.Title: “not what they say it is”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: the resort is very nice but it is about 45 minutes to an hour from Disney or Universal, and 99% of the population is Spanish not a resort to go to to get away from kids and there is no pool side bar and resort employees are gone by 4pm they are 5 kids to one adult. Not sure if I would go back.

Reviews.Title: “Good Family Place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the price. My family rented a 3 bed/2 bath villa...nice & clean....well manicured landscaping, clean pool. Clubhouse and lake a disappointment....not enough to do on the property and about 30-45 min. from most attractions.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the 3bdrm/2bath duplex over the Easter (2004) holiday and loved it. Its just a 10 minute drive to the town center and 20-25 minutes to Disney. It was nice to be away from the crowds at the end of the day. Our children especially liked the neighborhood setting. They even made friends. The whole "resort" was immaculate - from the unit we rented down to the pool. We will definitely stay at Lake Marion again the next time we are in Kissimmee.

Reviews.Title: “home from home”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Rented from a friend, spacious 3br, 2bth villa. Very comfortable with all the amenities of home.. Great for relaxing away from the hussel & bussel.. esp good if you like golf, many courses in the area.

Reviews.Title: “its not a resort”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: "lake marion golf resort" sounds good, well first of all i dont know why they called it golf resort,golf site is too far and they dont even own the golf site. going to the lake is like going to the jungle , they dont even cut the grass and clean the area.

Reviews.Title: “30 minutes from Disney”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Lake Marion can be hard to find the first time. only 30 minutes from Disney 10 minutes from Poinciana.Robin is most helpful, wish I could say the same for Keith. Its a nice place just far enough from all the neon lights but close enough to see the parks.

Reviews.Title: “nice time in central Florida”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Very nice 3 bedroom unit. Better than any suite hotel. Enjoyed being out of the Orlando 'hustle and bustle'. It was 40 minutes from leaving the unit to being in line at Disney - I've spent longer times using Disney transport while staying on site. Went to the 'campy' Gatorland as well - not too much to do, but is a glimpse of the types of attractions we went to as kids ('life BEFORE the Mouse') our boys loved it.

HotelInfo.Name: Lake Marion Golf Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 687 Lake Marion Golf Resort Drive, Kissimmee, FL 34759
